control-interactions.interaction:
⁪⁪⁪‌​‍​‍‌‍‌‌‌‍​‍‌‍​‌‍‍‌​​‍‍‌‍​‌​‍‌‍​‌​‌‌‍‍⁪ ArrowUp ArrowDown ArrowRight ArrowLeft ⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍‌​‌‍​​‍‌‍​​‌‍‍‌‍‌​​‌‍‍‌‌‍​‌‌​‌‍‍‍‍‌‍‍‌​⁪Moves the focus to the next cell within the same column or row in the respective directions.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍​​‌‍‍​​‍‍‍‌‌‌‌‌​‌​​‌​‍‍‌​‌‍‌​‌​‌‍‍​‍‌‍​⁪ArrowUp⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​​​‍‌​‌​​‍​‍​​​​​‌‍​​​‍‌​‍‍​‌‌‌‍​​‍‍‍‍‍⁪If the focus is on the first row, the focus moves to the column header row.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍‍‍​‍​‍‌‌​‍‍‍​‍‍‌‍‍‌‍​‍‌‌​‍‌​‌‌​​‌‌‍‍​⁪If the focus is on a cell of the first row, the focus moves to the related column header.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍‍‍‌​​​​‌‍‍‌​​‌‌​‍‌‌​‌‍​​‍‌​‍‍​‍‍‌‍​‌​​​⁪ArrowDown⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​‌‌​​​‍‍‍‌​‍‌‍‌‌‍‍‌​​‌‌‌‍​​​​‌‌​​‍‌‌‌‍‌⁪If the focus is on the Select All or the Clear All checkbox, the focus moves to the row selector in the first visible row.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍‌‍‍​‌‌​​​​​‍​​‌​​​​‍‍‍​‍‍‍‍‍‍‌‍​‍‌‌​​‍⁪If the focus is on the column header row, the focus moves to the first row.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍‍‌‌​​‍‌‌‍‍‍‌‌‍​‌‍​‍‍‍​‌‌‍‌​​​‌​‍‌​‍‌​‍​⁪If the focus is on a row, the focus moves to the row below.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‌‌​‍​​‌‍‌‍‍​‌‌​‌‌‍​​​‍‌​​‌‍‍​​‍​‍​‍‍‍‌‍‌⁪If the focus is on a cell, the focus moves to the cell below.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‍‍‍‍‍​‌‍​​​‍‍​‌‍​‌‌‍‌‌‌‍​‍‌‌‍​‌‍​‌​‍‌‍⁪ArrowLeft⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‌​‍​‍‍​‍‌​‍‍‍‌‌‍‍‌​‌‍‍‌​​​​‌‍‌‍‍​‌‍​‌​‍⁪If the focus is on the first cell, the focus moves to the row. This switches from cell-based navigation to row-based navigation.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‌​​​​​‌​‍​​‍​‌​‍​‌‍‍​‌​‍​‌​‍​‌‍​‌​‌‌​‌​⁪If the focus is on a cell, the focus moves to the cell to the left.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍‍​‍‍​‍‌‍‌​‌‌‌​​‌​‍‌​​‍‌‌​​‌‍‍‍‌‌‌​⁪ArrowRight⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍​‍‌​‍‌​‍‌‌‍‌‍‍‍‍​‍​‍‌‌‍​‍‍‍​‌‌‍​​‍‍‍​‍‌⁪If the focus is on a row, the focus moves to the first cell of the currently focused row. This switches from row-based navigation to cell-based navigation.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍‍‍​​‌​‌​‌​‍​​‌​‌‍‍‌​‍​‌​‍​‌‌‌‌‌‍​‍​‌​‌​⁪If the focus is on a cell, the focus moves to the cell to the right.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‌​​‍‍​‌‌​‍​‍‌​‌​‌‍‌​‌​‍‍‍‌​​‍‍‍​​‌‍‍​‌‍‌⁪Note: If the focus is on the last column, and the pop-in behavior has been enabled for this column, the pop-in area is treated like an additional column to the right, and the focus moves to this column.⁪⁪

⁪⁪⁪‌‍‍‌‍​​‌‍​‌‌‌‍‌‍‌‌‌‌​​​‍‍‍‌‍‍‍‍‍‍​‌‍‍​​​⁪ Alt + ArrowUp ⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​​‍​‌​​‍​‌‌​​‍​‌‌​‍‌‌‍‌​​‍‍‍​​‌‍‍‍‍‌‍​‍‌⁪If the focus is on a row, the focus moves to the column header row.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‌‌‌​​​‍​‌‍‌​​​‌‌​‍‌‍​‍‍​‌‍‍‌‌​‍​​‌‍‌‌​​‌⁪If the focus is on the column header row, and the More button is available, the focus moves to the More button.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​​‌​​​‌‌‍‌‌‌‍‍‍‌‍‌‌‍​‍​‍​‍‍‌‍‌‌‌‍‍‌‌​‌‍⁪If the focus is on the column header row, and the More button is not available, the focus moves to the last focused row.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​‍‌‍‌‍​‍‌​‍‍‍‍‌‌​​‌‍‍‍‌‌​‍‍‍‌‍‌​‌‍‍​​‍‌​⁪If the focus is on the More button, the focus moves to the last focused row.⁪⁪

⁪⁪⁪‍‍​‌​‌‍‌‌​‌‌‌‍‍​‌​​‌‍​​‌​‍‌​‍​​‍‌‍‌​‍‌‌‍⁪ Alt + ArrowDown ⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​‍‍‍‌‌‌‍‌‌‍‌‍‌​​‍‍‍‌‌​‍‌‌​​‌‍​‌‍‍‍‍​‌‍‌‌⁪If the focus is on a row, and the More button is available, the focus moves to the More button.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​‌‌‌‌​‌​‍‌‌​​‍‍‌​‌‍‍‌‍‌​‍‌‍‌‌‍‍‍‌​‍​‍‌​​⁪If the focus is on a row, and the More button is not available, the focus moves to the column header row.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‍​​‍‍‍‍‌‍​‍‌​‌​‍​‌​​‌​‌‍‌‍‌‍‍​‌‌‍‌‍‍‍‌‌⁪If the focus is on the More button, the focus moves to the column header row.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‌‌‌‌‌​​‍​‍​‍​​‌​‍​​​‌‍​‌‍‍​​‍​​​‍​‌‌​‌‍​⁪If the focus is on the column header row, the focus moves to the last focused row.⁪⁪

⁪⁪⁪‌​​​​‍‌‌‌​​‌‌​​‌​‌​‍‍​‌‍​​‌​‍‌‍​‌‍‍‍​‌‍‌⁪ Shift + ArrowRight ⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍‌‍​‌​​‌​​‍‌‍​‍‌​‌‌​‌‌​​​‍‌‍​​‍‌‌‌‌​​​‍​⁪If the focus is on the column header, the width of this column is increased by 1 em. This is repeated if key remains pressed.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‌‌​‌‍​​​‍‍‌‍‍‍‌​​​​‍‍‍​​​‌​‍‍‍‍‍‌​​‍‌⁪If cell selection is enabled:⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍‍‌‍‍‌​‍​‌‍‌‍​​​‌​‍​​‌‍​‍‌‍‌‍‌​​‌‌​‍‌​‍⁪If the focus is on a cell that is not selected, the focused cell and the cell to the right are selected. The focus moves to the cell to the right of the focused cell.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​‍​​​‍‍​​​‍‌​​‌‌‍‍‌​‌​​‍‍‍‌‌​​​​‍‍‌‍‌‍​‍⁪If the focus is on a selected cell, the cell to the right gets the focus, and the cell selection is enhanced up to this cell.⁪⁪

⁪⁪⁪‌​​‍‌‍‍‌‍‌‌‌‍‍​‍‍‍‍‌​​‍‌‌‌​​​‌‌‍‍‌‌​‍​‍‌⁪ Shift + ArrowLeft ⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‍​​​‍‍‌‌‍‌​‌​‍‍‍‌‌‌‍‌‌​​‍‍‌‍​‍‌‌​‌‌​​‌​⁪If the focus is on the column header, the width of this column is decreased by 1 em. This is repeated if key remains pressed.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‌‌​‌‌​‍​​​‍‍​‍‌‍​‍‍​‍‍‍‌‌‌​​​​​​​‍‍‌‌‍⁪If cell selection is enabled:⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍​​​​​‌‌​‍‌‌‍​​‍​‌‌​‍​​‍‍‍​‍​‌‍‌‌‍‌‌‍‌‌‌⁪If the focus is on a cell that is not selected, the focused cell and the cell to the left are selected. The focus moves to the cell to the left of the focused cell.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​‌​‍​‍‍‍‍‍‍​​‌‌‍​‌‍‌‍‌‌​‍‍‌‌​​‍​‌​‍‌‍‌​​⁪If the focus is on a selected cell, the cell to the left gets the focus, and the cell selection is enhanced up to this cell.⁪⁪

⁪⁪⁪‌​‍‍​‌‌​‌‍‌​‌​‌‌‌‌‌​‍‌​‍‍​‍‍​‌​‌​‌‍‌‌​‌​​⁪ Shift + ArrowUp ⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​‍​​​‍​‌‌​‍‌‌‌‌​​​‌‌​‌​‌‍​‌‌​‌‌‍‌​​‍‌​‍⁪If the focus is on a cell or the row selector and the relevant row is selected, the focus moves to the row above, and the selection is enhanced up to this row.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‍‍​‍​‌​‍​‌​‍​‌​‌‌‌​‌‍‌​‌‌‍​‌‌​​‌‌​​‌​‌‌⁪If the focus is on a cell or the row selector and the relevant row is not selected, the focus moves to the row above, and the selection is removed for this row.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​‍‌‌‌‌​‍​‍‌‍​‍‌‍‍‌​​‍​‍‌‌‌​​‌​​​​‌​​‍​‌⁪If cell selection is enabled:⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​​‌‍‍‍​‌​‍‍‌‌‍‍‌‍‍​​​​‍​‌‌​‌​‌‌‌‌‍​​​​‍⁪If the focus is on a cell that is not selected, and the row is notselected, the focused cell and the cell above are selected. The focus moves to the cell above the focused cell.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‌‌‌‌‌‌‌‍‌‌​​​‍​‍‌‍‌‍‍‌​‌‌​‌​​‌‍‌​‍​‍‍‌‌‍⁪If the focus is on a selected cell, the focus moves to the cell above, and the cell selection is enhanced up to this cell.⁪⁪

⁪⁪⁪‌‍‌​‍‍​‌​‍‌​‍‍‌‌‍‌‌​‌‌​‍‌‍‌‍‍‍‌​​‌​‌​‍​‍⁪ Shift + ArrowDown ⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​‌‌‍‍‍‍​‌‌​‌‌​‌‌‍‌‌‌‌‌‌‍​‍‍‌‍‍‌​​‌‍‌​‍‍​⁪If the focus is on a cell or the row selector, and the relevant row is selected, the focus moves to the row below, and the selection is enhanced up to this row.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍​‍​​‍​​‍‍‌​​‍‌​‌​‍‍‌​‌​‍‌‍​‌‍‌‍​​‌‍‌‍‌​⁪If the focus is on a cell or the row selector, and the relevant row is not selected, the focus moves to the row below, and the selection is removed for this row.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​‍‌​‍​​‌‌​‌​‍​‍‌‌‌‍‌‌‍‍‌​​‌​‍‌‍‌‍​‌‌​⁪If cell selection is enabled:⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‌​‍‌​‍‌‍​‍​‌​‍‌‌​​‌​​‍‌​​‍‍‍‌​​‍‍‌​‌​‌​⁪If the focus is on a cell that is not selected, and the row is not selected, the focused cell and the cell below are selected. The focus moves to the cell below the focused cell. ⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‌‌‌‌​‍‌‍​‌‌‌‍​​‌‍​‍‌​‌​‍‌‌‌​‍‌‌‌​‌‌​​​‍‍⁪If the focus is on a selected cell, the focus moves to the cell below, and the cell selection is enhanced up to this cell.⁪⁪

⁪⁪⁪‌​‍‌​‌‌‌‌‍‌​‍​​‍‍‌‌‌‌‍‍‍​​‍​​​‍‌​‌‌‍‍‍‌​‍⁪ Ctrl + ArrowUp ⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍‍‍‌​‍‍‍‍‌‌‍‌​‍‍‍​​​‌​​‌‍‌‍‌​​‍‍​‌‌​​‌‍⁪If the focus is on an editable cell (for example, an input field), the focus moves to the cell above.⁪⁪

⁪⁪⁪‌​‍‌​‌‌​​​​‌​‌‍‌‍​​​‍‍​‍​‌‌‍​​‌​‌‌​‌​​‍‍⁪ Ctrl + ArrowDown ⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​‌‌​​​‌‍​‌​‌‍​‌‍​‌‌‍​​‌​‌‌​‍‍‍‍‍‌​‍‌‌‌​‌⁪If the focus is on an editable cell (for example, an input field), the focus moves to the cell below.⁪⁪

⁪⁪⁪‌‍​​​​‌​‍‍‌‌‌​‌‌​‍‍‍‌​‍‍​‍‍‌‌‌​‌​‍‍‌‌‌​‌⁪ Spacebar ⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‌​​​‍​‍​‌‌​‌‍​‌‍‌​‌​‍‍​​​‌‍‍‍​‍​‌‌‍​​‌‌‌⁪If cell selection is enabled:⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​​​‍‍​​​​​​​‌‍‍‌‌‌‌‌‌‍‍‍​‍‍‌​‌‌‌​​​‍‍​​​⁪If the focus is on a cell, the focused cell is selected.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍​‌‍‍‌‌‌‍‍‌‌‍​‍‍‍​​‌​‌‍‌​‌​‌‌‍‍‌‍​‌​‍​‍⁪If the focus is on a cell selection block, the selection of the cells is removed.⁪⁪

⁪⁪⁪‍‌‍​‍‍‌‍‍​‍‌​‌​​‌‍​​‌​‌‌‌‍​​‌‌​‍​​‍​‍‍​‌⁪ Shift + Spacebar ⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍​​​‌‍​​​‍‍‍‌​‌‍‍​‌‍‌‍‌​​​​​​‍‌‍‌​‌​⁪If cell selection is enabled:⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​​​‍​​‍​​‌‍‍‌‌​​‍​‍‌​‌‍‌‍‌​‍​‌‍​​‍​‍​​‌‍⁪If the focus is on a cell selection block, the cell selection block is changed into a row selection. The cell selection is removed.⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‍​‍‍​​‍​‌​‍‍‍​‍​‍‌​‌‌​‍​‍​‌​‍‌​‌‍‍‍​‍‌‌⁪Depending on the row selection mode the following happens:⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍​​​‍​‍‌‍‌​‌‍‍​​‌​‌​‍​‍‌‍‍‍​​​‍​‌​‌‍‍‍⁪All rows of the block are selected (multiple selection)⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‌‌‍‌​‌‍​​‍‌​‌‍‍‌‍​‌‌‌‌‌‍‍‍‌‌​‌​‌‍​‌‌‍⁪Only the row with the currently focused cell is selected (single selection)⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍​‌​‍‌‌​​​‍​‍‍‌‌‍‌​​​‍‍‍​​‍​‍‌‌​​‌​‌‍‍‌‌⁪None of the rows are selected⁪⁪

⁪⁪⁪‌​​‌​‍​‍‌​‍‍​‍​‍‍​​‌​‍‌‍​‍‌‌​‌‍​​‍‌‍‌‍‌‌⁪ Ctrl + Shift + A ⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​‌‌​‍​​‌‍​‌‍​​‌‍‍‍‌​‌‍​‍​​​‍​​‌‍‌‌‍‍‌‍‌⁪If cell selection is enabled:⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌​​‍‌‍​‌‌‍‍‌​‍‍‍‌‍‍‌‌​‍‍‍‌‍‌‌​‌‌‍‌​‌‍​​​⁪If the focus is inside of the table, the selection for any rows and cells is removed.⁪⁪

⁪⁪⁪‌‍‌‍​​‍‍‌‌​‍‌‍‍​‍‍‍​​​‌​​‌​‌‍​‍​‌‍‍‌‌​‍‌⁪ Escape ⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍‌​‍​‌‍‍‌‌‍‌‍‌‍‍‍‌​‌‍‍​‌​​‌‍‌‍‍​‌‍‍‌​​​​⁪If cell selection is enabled:⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍​​‌​‍‌‍‍​​​‍​​‍‍​‌​‍‌​​‌​‍​‍​​‌​‍​‌​​‍​⁪If the focus is inside of the table, and cells are selected, the selection of the cells is removed.⁪⁪

⁪⁪⁪‌​​‌​​​‍‌​‍‍‍‍‌‌​​‌​‍‍‌​​‍‌‌‌​‍​‍‌‍​‍‌‌⁪ F2 ⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍‍‍‍‌​‍‌‍‍​​‌‍‍‌‍‌​‍‌​‍​‌‌‍‍‌‌​​‍​​​‍⁪Toggles the focus between the cell and its content if the cell has interactive elements, such as an input field or button (with the exception of read-only text).⁪⁪

⁪⁪⁪‌​‌‌‌‍‍​‍‍​‍‌‍​‌​​​​‌‌‌‌​‍‌‌‌‌‌‌‍​‌‌​‍‍‍⁪ Shift + MouseClick ⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‍‍‌​​‌‍‌​​​‌‌​‍‌‍‍‌​​‌‍‌‍‍‌​‍​​​‌‌‌‌‌‍​​⁪If cell selection is enabled:⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‌​‌‌‌​‍‍‌​‍‍‍‍​​​​​‌‌​​‍‍​‌​‌‍‌‍‍‌‌‍‌‍‍‍⁪If cells are selected, pressing Shift and clicking on a different cell enhances the selection up to the clicked cell.⁪⁪

⁪⁪⁪‌‍‍‍​‌​​‍‍‍‌‌​‍​‍‌‌‍​‌‌‍‌​‌‌‌‍​‍‌‌‍​​‌‌‌⁪ Ctrl + C ⁪⁪
⁪⁪⁪‌‍​​‍‌‍‌‌​‌​​​‍‌​‍‍‍‍​​​​‌​‌‍​​‍‍‍​​‍‌​‍⁪Copies the selected rows or cells to the clipboard if available, and the feature is enabled.⁪⁪
